definitions.definition: A cyclic monoterpene alcohol ; the major component of the essential oil of peppermint ; used in pharmaceutical preparations as an antitussive and antipruritic agent, as a nasal decongestant , and in menthol cigarettes .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A cyclic monoterpene alcohol ; the major component of the essential oil of peppermint ; used in pharmaceutical preparations as an antitussive and antipruritic agent, as a nasal decongestant , and in menthol cigarettes .
